content:
Hi everyone,

I am currently utilizing Leandojo to interact with the Lean theorem prover, which allows me to include additional imports for the target theorem. Consequently, I would like to determine the shortest sequence of imports that would grant my target theorem access to as more theorems as possible in Mathlib4. This would enable the neural prover to generate a wider range of tactics which will not trigger "unknown * error".

Since I am not a native English speaker if this question looks confusing, please inform me and assist in refining it. Thank youÔºÅ
Shaonan Wu has marked this topic as resolved.
